name: Bret Harte Elementary School
description: Serves: Early Education, Elementary School (PreK, TK, K, 1-5) At Bret Harte, our mission is to provide high-quality instructional programs within a safe learning environment that maximizes individual talents and strengths, celebrates diversity, and prepares students to be productive citizens. Community Partnerships - Adventures in Music (AIM) - sends students to SF Symphony performances - America SCORES Bay Area - teaches students soccer and poetry - Bay Area Community Resources (BEACON program)
